author: eptwts
text:
had a conversation with a friend today, he is a "guru" on IG...

we talked about the fact that on IG you've gotta sell to the low-level lifestyle gooners, AKA "wantrepreneurs"

whereas on X, you're kinda selling services TO the gurus

in other words, people on X know exactly what you're doing, so you've gotta make your offer good or they'll see through the bullshit

anyone who complains about high market sophistication on X, is basically saying "my offer is intended for a low-level crowd"

and they're right, they won't see much success tryna sell that shit here

but there's a lot of very serious people on this app

if you have an offer that'll actually be beneficial to them, you WILL make a lot of money, no doubt about it
